GeneralInformation.School Vision: A Leading School of Vibrant Learners, Rooted in Good Values
GeneralInformation.School Mission: To provide a unique schooling experience in a  caring community to  develop every child in the Cognitive, Aesthetic, Moral, Physical and Social (CAMPS) domains.
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: In Endeavour, we prepare our pupils to be ready for the future; as a school, we are innovative;
in what we do, we are child-centric; and we want our pupils to show excellence in all that they do.

The school is guided by a simple Philosophy: "In all that we do, it is for the students, and in what we do, we want to do it well." There is a concerted effort among staff to be student-centric and to do our best to enable all students to succeed.
School Vision:  A Leading School of Vibrant Learners, Rooted in Good Values
- "A Leading School": To lead in innovative practices and be a school of excellence
- "Vibrant Learners": To learn with passion and to be developed in the 21st CC (in particular, Curiosity, Confidence & Collaboration) to take on the challenges of the future
-"Rooted in Good Values": To live by school values of diligence, perseverance, innovation, integrity, compassion, respect and responsibility; and to be of exemplary character
School Mission: To provide a unique schooling experience in a caring community to develop every child in the Cognitive, Aesthetics, Moral, Physical and Social (CAMPS) domains.
- We believe in building a culture of care in fulfilling our mission
- We develop our pupils to be cognitively abled, aesthetically attuned, morally upright, physically active and socially responsible.
School Strategic Thrusts (ST) to support the realisation of School Vision are:
- ST 1: Nurturing pupils to become citizens of fine character
- ST 2: Inspiring pupils to become vibrant learners
- ST 3: Growing staff to lead in personal and professional excellence
- ST 4: Engaging partners to support holistic education

Through our programmes, in particular the LLP and ALP, our school continues to strengthen our identity in the community as a school of innovative practices in providing holistic education for our pupils.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government School / Co-ed School / Single Session

School Distinctive Programmes.Interdisciplinary: Nurturing Thinkers through Knowledge Building Practices
